description: Measures the time between requests and corresponding replies and provides the number of open requests as a probe stream.

properties.name: probename
properties.label: Probe Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this probe to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: correlationproprequest
properties.label: Request Correlation Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property that contains the value to correlate requests and replies.

properties.name: correlationpropreply
properties.label: Reply Correlation Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property that contains the value to correlate requests and replies.

properties.name: maxopenrequests
properties.label: Maximum Open Requests
properties.description: Provide the maximum open requests to track.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.
